entry.title: bitcoind as a library
entry.summary: Oliver Egginger sent an email to someone (name not mentioned) on November 28, 2014, asking for a C library that could be used for a research project involving block chain analysis. In the email, he provided a link to picocoin repository on Github and asked if it could be useful. He also received a response with a suggestion of another library called cbitcoin, along with a Github link.
